athuru kamitu (3) athhituwa athi ho swakiya liyapadinchiya prathikshepa kara ho awalangu kara athi yam jathika krida sangamayaka karthawya itukirima sandaha panathe 33 wana waganthiya prakarawa yam athuru wadapiliwelak yatathe pathkara athi yam thanaththaku ho thanaththan wisin wenath karunu athara konthrathwalata, giwisumwalata athulath wime ayithiya, banku ginum pawathwagena yame ayithiya athuluwa ema liyapadinchiya athhituwa awalangu kara ho prathikshepa kara athi jathika sangamayak wisin bhukthi windinu labana siyalu balathala, ayithiwasikam saha waraprasada bhukthi windinu labiya yuthu athara ema liyapadinchiya athhituwanu laba, awalangu kara ho prathikshepa kara athi jathika krida sangamaye siyalu karthawya akhandawa pawathwagena yamata saha ema jathika krida sangamaye karthawya akhandawa pawathwagena yamata awashya bawata peniyana aluth wadapiliwelak ho wyapruthi sandaha athulath wimata ema thanaththata ho thanaththanta sampurnayenma balaya pawara atha.
